Gisborne police launch homicide investigation https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/gisborne-police-launch-homicide-investigation/WC7XJVVZYNBCFHFTVJJ4X3BRB4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/gisborne-police-launch-homicide-investigation/WC7XJVVZYNBCFHFTVJJ4X3BRB4/A man died of severe injuries early on Monday morning. Sun, 27 Oct 2024 21:50:23 +0000 A man was transported by ambulance to Gisborne Hospital with severe injuries and later died. Initial police inquiries indicate the injuries were sustained at a residential address in Tolerton Ave. Photo / File
Gisborne median house price up 10.1% on September 2023 to $605,500 https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/gisborne-median-house-price-up-101-on-september-2023-to-605500/A7U45FANM5AF3FFXLS557RO3BY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/gisborne-median-house-price-up-101-on-september-2023-to-605500/A7U45FANM5AF3FFXLS557RO3BY/ Wynsley WrigleyThe region saw 38 sales in September, up 22.6% from last year. Huge Wairarapa farm Palliser Bay Station on property market for first time in decades https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/huge-wairarapa-farm-palliser-bay-station-on-property-market-for-first-time-in-decades/U7XMQWEJZRGAFGTFORMV6P2ULQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/huge-wairarapa-farm-palliser-bay-station-on-property-market-for-first-time-in-decades/U7XMQWEJZRGAFGTFORMV6P2ULQ/ Cherie HowieThe station boasts dramatic views across Cook Strait to the Kaikōura Ranges. Sun, 27 Oct 2024 21:28:37 +0000 This slice of dramatic coastline and farming country on the Wairarapa coast is for sale.
Serious crash in Helensville closes State Highway 16 https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/serious-crash-in-helensville-closes-state-highway-16/J5NJA5GHSNGTPOGSNSDPHLKHLA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/serious-crash-in-helensville-closes-state-highway-16/J5NJA5GHSNGTPOGSNSDPHLKHLA/Detours have been put in place. Man in charge of Tairāwhiti police a local lad: Danny Kirk https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/man-in-charge-of-tairawiti-police-a-local-lad-danny-kirk/W5WHDG4TXZDI7CEVI56TRBFXOM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/gisborne-herald/news/man-in-charge-of-tairawiti-police-a-local-lad-danny-kirk/W5WHDG4TXZDI7CEVI56TRBFXOM/ Murray Robertson'We respond to a more diverse range of calls for service these days.' Sun, 27 Oct 2024 21:06:30 +0000 Danny Kirk (pictured on the balcony of the police station in Gisborne) is the new area commander of police for Tairāwhiti. He was born and raised in Gisborne.
